Name: Bank of America
Description: One of the largest banks in the United States, offering a wide range of financial services.

Name: Wells Fargo
Description: A major American multinational financial services company headquartered in San Francisco, California.

Name: Chase Bank
Description: The consumer and commercial banking subsidiary of JPMorgan Chase, one of the largest banking institutions in the United States.

Name: Citibank
Description: The consumer division of financial services multinational Citigroup, known for its extensive global network.

Name: Goldman Sachs
Description: A leading global investment banking, securities, and investment management firm.
